entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High plus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries late this afternoon. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 7 this morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM ADT Thursday 23 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Rain mixed with snow. Temperature steady near plus 1.
entry.summary: Snow changing to rain or snow late this evening. Fog patches developing near midnight. Snowfall amount 5 to 10 cm. Rainfall amount 5 to 10 mm. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature steady near plus 1. Forecast issued 11:00 AM ADT Thursday 23 March 2023
